details: Build AWS-based, cloud-native, full-stack systems to support modules in a large-scale web app
Design scalable systems to create customer-facing features and improve existing system latency
Communicate closely with external teams to understand product needs, estimate timelines, and ensure consistency in common code packages
Maintain fully automated continuous deployment pipelines by writing unit tests and integration tests, to reduce developer effort and make seamless deployments
Implemented a data pipeline using Kotlin, AWS Services (Lambda, SNS, SQS) and a big-data platform to automate a task that took 60 developer days annually
Built data pipelines to collect CI/CD and Git version control data, and used that data to calculate key DevOps metrics for the team
Utilized AWS (Lambda, Redis, SQS) and Node.js (TypeScript) to design and implement a serverless system to collect CI/CD data
Deployed a Docker container containing a Python script to collect version control data
Employed good software practices and utilized a continuous deployment pipeline to seamlessly make additions to system
Collaborated closely with teammates to maintain consistency across the codebase and ensure proper handling of future errors
Developed a compressed object detection neural network using PyTorch to be deployed on an IoT runtime system
Implemented compression by performing knowledge distillation on the YOLO object detection model to train a smaller neural network
Achieved up to 5x speedup on original YOLO model and optimized the compressed model’s runtime while maintaining its accuracy
Led recitation sessions, held office hours and lectured in absence of professor to effectively teach class material to students with various programming backgrounds
Redesigned course components to integrate more hands-on programming and develop students’ collaborative skills
Developed in-depth exercises and demos to teach students fundamental software engineering concepts
Facilitated learning by encouraging collaborative problem solving to engage students
Prepared lessons to maintain pace and depth of instruction that suited lectures and exams
Mentored newer SI Leaders and communicated with supervisors to ensure that appropriate material was being taught

details: Led officer team to organize events that connect organization members to industry and academic resources
Coordinated with faculty and alumni to host department-wide events
